title: Descriptions: People (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the People subcategory within Descriptions. Includes 5 card(s).

cards.japanese: キャメロン・ディアスは美しいです。

cards.english: Mr./Ms. Yamada is an energetic person.
cards.romaji: Yamada-san wa genki na hito desu.
cards.japanese: 山田さんは元気な人です。

cards.romaji: Masami-san wa otoko no hito desu.
cards.japanese: まさみさんは男の人です。
